pr_title: Fix small nits in method names and patterns we use in metrics SDK

timeline.bodyText: I think it reads a little better to have these helper methods, rather than requiring callers to look for nulls.
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Helper public methods means more to maintain and take care of, there is only one usage of this and I think it is worth the downside of reading to not have to maintain ABI compatibility.
replies.author: bogdandrutu

timeline.message:
Fix small nits in method names and patterns we use in metrics SDK

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>
